alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 2:52PM EST until February 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions on untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All forms of precipitation are possible across the area at times including rain, snow, sleet and freezing rain. Precipitation will gradually taper off to patchy drizzle or freezing drizzle during the overnight hours before ending toward daybreak Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
